Module com.example.miniproject2
Package com.example.miniproject2.controller

Interface ITimer

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController
public interface ITimer
The ITimer interface defines the methods required for a timer component within the Sudoku application. Implementing classes should provide the functionality to manage the timer's lifecycle and display.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    resetTimer()
    Resets the timer to its initial state.
    void
    startTimer()
    Starts the timer.
    void
    stopTimer()
    Stops the timer.
    void
    updateLabel()
    Updates the display label of the timer to show the current elapsed time.

  • Method Details

    • startTimer

      void startTimer()
      Starts the timer. The timer begins counting time.

    • stopTimer

      void stopTimer()
      Stops the timer. The timer halts its counting until restarted.

    • resetTimer

      void resetTimer()
      Resets the timer to its initial state. The elapsed time is cleared.

    • updateLabel

      void updateLabel()
      Updates the display label of the timer to show the current elapsed time.
